headline: rainfall warning in effect
description:
Rain, at times heavy, continues.

What:
Local rainfall amounts of 50 to 60 millimetres.

When:
Continuing through Tuesday morning.

Additional information:
Rainfall amounts near 40 millimetres have been observed over some locations. 
Additional rainfall amounts of 10 to 20 millimetres is expected tonight. The showers are expected to ease Tuesday morning. 

For information concerning flooding, please consult your local Conservation Authority or Ontario Ministry of Natural Resources office. Visit Ontario.ca/floods for the latest details.

###

Heavy downpours can cause flash floods and water pooling on roads. Localized flooding in low-lying areas is possible.

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to ONstorm@ec.gc.ca or post reports on X using #ONStorm.
instruction: If visibility is reduced while driving, slow down, watch for tail lights ahead and be prepared to stop.
